direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve removing elements from the collection, but 'removeAll' removes multiple elements based on a collection.
Both methods handle the removal of elements, with 'removeFromIndex' specifically managing the index update after removal.
Both methods involve conditional removal of elements, but 'removeIf' uses a predicate to determine which elements to remove.
Both methods affect the state of the collection, with 'clear' removing all elements and resetting the collection.
Both methods modify the collection by removing elements, but 'retainAll' retains only the elements present in the provided collection.
